title: How to Play As a Mage in Lord of the Rings Conquest
category_hierarchy: The Lord of the Rings: Conquest

steps.headline: Go to a mission.
steps.description: Pick either the campaign or Instant Action.

steps.headline: Press 'X/Square' to hit enemies with your staff.
steps.description: Press it repeatedly to slam it into the ground with a burst of magical energy.

steps.headline: Press 'B/Circle' to launch a fireball.
steps.description: Upon impact, it will create a ring of fire, burning any enemies inside.

steps.headline: Press 'RT/R2' to shoot lightning from your hand.
steps.description: Aim for enemies at the center of your screen.

steps.headline: Press ad hold 'LT/L2' to create a bubble shield.
steps.description: This will deflect any attack, and protect any allies inside.

steps.headline: Press 'LB/L1' to use a healing spell.
steps.description: This will raise your health, along with the health of any nearby enemies.

steps.headline: Press 'Y/Triangle' for a large burst of magical energy from your staff.
steps.description: This will significantly lower the health of any nearby enemies and send survivors flying.

text: Go to a mission. Pick either the campaign or Instant Action. Start the mission. Choose the Mage class. Press 'X/Square' to hit enemies with your staff. Press it repeatedly to slam it into the ground with a burst of magical energy. Press 'B/Circle' to launch a fireball. Upon impact, it will create a ring of fire, burning any enemies inside. Press 'RT/R2' to shoot lightning from your hand. Aim for enemies at the center of your screen. Press ad hold 'LT/L2' to create a bubble shield. This will deflect any attack, and protect any allies inside. Press 'LB/L1' to use a healing spell. This will raise your health, along with the health of any nearby enemies. Press 'Y/Triangle' for a large burst of magical energy from your staff. This will significantly lower the health of any nearby enemies and send survivors flying.
